title: Unable to connect after champ select
body:
An old issue that seems to have reappeared - all good through to champion select then my client won't make the final connection to the server. After about 15-30 seconds I get a popup that says "Unable to connect to the server. Please check your network connection and attempt to reconnect to your game."

Previously I'd hit cancel here, it would tell me the game had crashed and would reconnect and that'd be all good. Doesn't seem to be working anymore - at least not consistently. Sometimes it does it first time, but I've had times where I'm sitting there hitting that reconnect button until it finally works, putting me into the game at 2:40, or 7:50, or 9:25. Kinda hard to play catchup when you're 9 mins behind.

It's been happening more often since 6.9 patch was released, but I've also "upgraded" to Windows 10 in the meantime (still not sure why). 

Simple fix might be to revert back to older Windows, but would prefer to avoid that if there's a fix.

**Side note**
I've already gone into my firewall (ZoneAlarm) and added the updated the exceptions to allow LoL full access.
I've also already tried running the game in Compatibility Mode for Vista and Windows 7, with no change to the result.


Any help would be much appreciated.
